ranges.name: Spectacular Failure
ranges.description: You make a thorough mess of your attempt as you forget even the most basic principles of this maneuver. You are at -20 modification to your next two actions while you recover from your stunning failure.

ranges.name: Absolute Failure
ranges.description: Your remarkable failure marks you for ridicule. Hope your parents weren't watching...

ranges.name: Failure
ranges.description: You fail. Your skill is not up to the task. Maybe next time.

ranges.name: Partial Success
ranges.description: Your attempt bears little fruit, but you appear to be on the right track. Perhaps more attention to detail will improve your chances.

ranges.name: Near Success
ranges.description: You are within sight of your goal! If appropriate, you may attempt to complete your maneuver with another roll with a modification of +10.

ranges.name: Success
ranges.description: Congratulations! You are completely successful in your attempt. Carry on.

ranges.name: Absolute Success
ranges.description: Zounds! Your masterful performance has stretched the boundaries of your own abilities! You operate at +10 (non-cumulative) to all future attempts to use this skill, until you receive a result of Absolute Failure or Spectacular Failure.

um_66.name: Unusual Event
um_66.description: Your maneuver is beset by an unusual event. It may or may not be a beneficial occurrence (GM should choose or determine randomly).

um_100.name: Unusual Success
um_100.description: You have achieved a remarkable success in an unusual fashion. The GM should determine the details; this result may occur because of an unexpected extraneous event or because of a remarkable personal effort.
